languages.text: "Фроше, режим тишины". {n}Инквизитор властно кивает слуге, достающему из кармана какой-то пульт. Звуки, источник которых лежит далее, чем в трех метрах от вас, умирают.{/n}

"Froscher, if you please." {n}The Inquisitor nods imperiously at the servant, who draws some kind of remote control from his pocket. All sounds whose sources are more than three metres away fade to nothing.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Фроше, режим тишины". {n}Инквизитор властно кивает слуге, достающему из кармана какой-то пульт. Звуки, источник которых лежит далее, чем в трех метрах от вас, умирают.{/n}

traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “弗罗舍，拜托了。”{n}大审判官居高临下地朝他的仆人点了点头。仆人从口袋里掏出了一个遥控器，随后，三米之外的所有声音都彻底消失了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Froscher, if you please." {n}The Inquisitor nods imperiously at the servant, who draws some kind of remote control from his pocket. All sounds whose sources are more than three metres away fade to nothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “弗罗舍，拜托了。”{n}审判长居高临下地朝他的仆人点了点头。仆人从口袋里掏出了一个遥控器，随后，三米之外的所有声音都彻底消失了。{/n}
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Froscher, por favor». {n}El Inquisidor asiente, imperioso, en dirección a su sirviente, que saca una especie de mando a distancia del bolsillo. Todos los sonidos cuyo origen está situado a más de tres metros se desvanecen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Froscher, if you please." {n}The Inquisitor nods imperiously at the servant, who draws some kind of remote control from his pocket. All sounds whose sources are more than three metres away fade to nothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Froscher, por favor». {n}El Inquisidor asiente, imperioso, en dirección a su sirviente, que saca una especie de mando a distancia del bolsillo. Todos los sonidos cuyo origen está situado a más de tres metros se desvanecen.{/n}
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「フロッシャー、頼む」{n}異端審問官が居丈高に従者へ向かってうなずくと、従者はポケットから何種類かの遠隔制御装置を取りだす。3メートル以上離れた場所から聞こえるあらゆる音が、徐々に遠ざかっていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Froscher, if you please." {n}The Inquisitor nods imperiously at the servant, who draws some kind of remote control from his pocket. All sounds whose sources are more than three metres away fade to nothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「フロッシャー、頼む」{n}異端審問官が居丈高に従者へ向かってうなずくと、従者はポケットから何種類かの遠隔制御装置を取りだす。3メートル以上離れた場所から聞こえるあらゆる音が、徐々に遠ざかっていく。{/n}
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Froscher, je vous prie. » {n}Le seigneur inquisiteur adresse un signe de tête impérieux au serviteur, qui sort une sorte de télécommande de sa poche. Tous les sons dont la source se trouve à plus de trois mètres se taisent.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Froscher, if you please." {n}The Inquisitor nods imperiously at the servant, who draws some kind of remote control from his pocket. All sounds whose sources are more than three metres away fade to nothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Froscher, je vous prie. » {n}Le seigneur inquisiteur adresse un signe de tête impérieux au serviteur, qui sort une sorte de télécommande de sa poche. Tous les sons dont la source se trouve à plus de trois mètres se taisent.{/n}
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Froscher, bitte!" {n}Der Inquisitor nickt dem Diener gebieterisch zu, der daraufhin eine Art Fernbedienung aus der Tasche zieht. Alle Geräusche, deren Quellen mehr als drei Meter entfernt sind, werden komplett ausgeblendet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Froscher, if you please." {n}The Inquisitor nods imperiously at the servant, who draws some kind of remote control from his pocket. All sounds whose sources are more than three metres away fade to nothing.{/n}

traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Froscher, lütfen." {n}Engizisyoncu'nun başıyla buyruk verdiği hizmetkârı, cebinden bir çeşit uzaktan kumanda çıkarıyor. Kaynağı üç metreden uzak olan tüm sesler bir anda kesiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Froscher, if you please." {n}The Inquisitor nods imperiously at the servant, who draws some kind of remote control from his pocket. All sounds whose sources are more than three metres away fade to nothing.{/n}
